snippet.title: Softie Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for my first game on Steam as a solo-dev! A short point-and-click indie game about a teddy bear fella looking for his owner.........It will be out on Steam & Itch.io on October 31, 2024! Please Wishlist it on Steam! It helps a lot!!! Thank yall so much!!!!!!!!!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3286710/Softie/
